name: mo4
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: At-most-one quantifier expressed using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-1995.)
